member.name: T:W3b.Sine.BigNumDec
member.summary: Implements arbitrary-precsision arithmetic with a decimal byte array.

member.summary: An immutable arbitary-precision number class.

member.summary: Divides this instance by the divisor, returning the quotient.

member.summary: Divides this instance by the divisor, returning the remainder.

member.summary: Inverts this instance's sign

member.summary: Returns the norm of the number

member.summary: Creates an instance of BigNum set to zero.

member.summary: Gets the name of the implementation, for rejecting incompatible BigNum types.

member.summary: The exponential part.

member.summary: Whether to print + in ToString if the value is positive.

member.summary: Number of digits to get when dividing.

member.name: F:W3b.Sine.BigNumDec._toStringLimit
member.summary: Number of digits to display when calling ToString().

member.name: M:W3b.Sine.BigNumDec.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new BigNumDec with an empty data list. Not identical to zero.

member.name: M:W3b.Sine.BigNumDec.Msd(System.Int32)
member.summary: Nabs the most significant digits of this number. If is greater than the length of the number it pads zeros.

member.name: M:W3b.Sine.BigNumDec.AlignExponent(W3b.Sine.BigNumDec)
member.summary: Makes the exponent values of both numbers equal by padding zeros.

member.name: M:W3b.Sine.BigNumDec.Normalise
member.summary: Removes chaff elements from the internal list.

member.summary: Represents a simple expression stack (LIFO).

member.summary: Evaluates the stacked expressions in a FIFO (aka LILO) order.

member.summary: Pushes an expression onto the stack.

member.name: M:W3b.Sine.ExpressionStack.Pop
member.summary: Removes the last entered expression from the stack.

member.name: P:W3b.Sine.ExpressionStack.PrintOperations
member.summary: Set to True to print operations to Console as they happen.
